channel.title: Editing shop items
channel.description:
hey i knda need help with my server. I wanna edit the ITEMS the PRICES and the AMOUNTS of the item but when i go to the "config" file then shops and try to edit them i always screw it up!
any help?
i just want a tutorial, easy as possible (i'm a noob)

item.title: Editing shop items
item.dc:creator: @d_man103456 d man103456
item.description:
@d_man103456 wrote:

make sure, like kickingjamie said, use the tab key between the item id and amount

shop = 11	Lowe's_Archery_Emporium				2	2	2491	1000	2497	1000	2503	1000	2883	20	861	200	859	120	4734	20	4212	10	1478	50	2501	30	2495	30	2499	35	2493	35	1135	40	892	10000

see 2491 is the item id, and the 1000 is the amount, then it repeats, 2497 and 1000 is the amount. and for the price of the item

item = 13665	Dragon_platebody	The_ultimate_dragon_design.	10000000	20000000	10000000	0	20	20	-20	0	96	108	113	-4	97	0	0

the first 10000000 is what players can sell it to shops for, the the 20000000 is what the shops sell it for, and the last 10000000 is what it alchs for then the other numbers are just the bonuses. If you need any more help just pm me.

Read full topic

item.title: Editing shop items
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

when your adding things into config files you need to use the tab key instead of pressing the space bar. also everything must be ligned up properly.

Read full topic

item.title: Editing shop items
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:

Go into a file called shops? And edit it? Its not hard its like…

ITEM AMOUNT i think shops arent really my strong point
